text: Victor Charles Barney (3 April 1922 – 26 May 2006) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward. Barney was an infantryman in the British Army during the Second World War. While in Italy, he was charged with the renovation of the Stadio Arturo Collana and played for Napoli. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Footballers from Stepney Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Oxford City F.C. players Category:S.S.C. title: Vic Barney
